content.query:
SELECT TOP (100) [PINS_Join_staff_number]
,[email_address]
 FROM [odw_workspace_db].[dbo].[vw_sap_hr_email_weekly_layer1_harmonised]


 SELECT  *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://pinsodwdatadevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/odw-standardised/sap-load-tables/sap-hr',
    FORMAT = 'delta') as rows;
